abstract: Kevin Weekes of Queens is convicted of second-degree murder, assault and reckless endangerment, for driving car into crowd in Laurelton neighborhood in 2014, killing Kevin Lewis.
lead_paragraph: After a fistfight outside a baby shower in 2014, Kevin Weekes returned to his car and drove into the crowd, killing one person and injuring another, the authorities said.

headline.main: Queens Man Convicted of Murder for Dragging Victim Under Car

snippet: After a fistfight outside a baby shower in 2014, Kevin Weekes returned to his car and drove into the crowd, killing one person and injuring another, the authorities said.
